abstract: I interviewed Tony Blair in his suite at New York's Carlyle Hotel on the steamy afternoon of September 23rd. He was in New York for the meeting of the UN General Assembly in his capacity as Middle East Envoy, a post announced just hours after he stepped down as British Prime Minister in 2007.

headline.main: Tony Blair: 'They Keep Insinuating and I Keep Saying it's Not True'
